title: Company Settings
subtitle: Here you can check or change information about your company.
webhookSubtitle: Receive automatic notifications when payments are made.
webhookNotificationUrlHelper: Where should we send payment notifications?
webhookSecretKeyHelper: Use this to verify notifications are really from DynoPay.
webhookRegenerateConfirmMessage: Your current secret key will stop working immediately. Make sure to update your integration before generating a new one.
paymentToleranceSubtitle: Control how much variance to accept in payments.

paymentToleranceFields.acceptUnderpaymentsHelper: If a $100 payment comes in as $99, it will still be marked as complete.
paymentToleranceFields.flagOverpaymentsHelper: You'll get a notification when someone pays more than this amount over the total.
paymentToleranceFields.timeForPartialPaymentsHelper: How long to wait for a customer to complete a partial payment

cryptoConversionSubtitle: Incoming BTC, ETH, LTC will be automatically converted to a stablecoin.
cryptoConversionAlert: Please set up your USDT/USDC wallet first.
